description: This file demonstrates the usage of an Agent with a WatsonX model for reasoning tasks, including setting up the agent and printing a response for a specific prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing reasoning tasks with specified models.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from an agent after executing a reasoning task.

classes.name: WatsonX
classes.description: Model class for IBM WatsonX models used for reasoning.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to print or stream the reasoning response based on a prompt.
